refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the title string for the current database or, if used with an argument, renames the database.

refsection.para: Returns the title string for the current database or, if used with an argument, renames the database. Quotation marks must be doubly escaped.
The example shows the use of the title command with an argument to rename the current database.

example.para: Sets the title of the current database to This is my database.

refsection.para: Reports of bugs or problems should be submitted via electronic mail to <devs@brlcad.org>, or via the "cadbug.sh" script.
